item.description: Join us Monday evening at the Nashua Borders Bookstore on the Daniel Webster Highway at 7:00pm. Look for the people playing games in the cafe.
item.how_to_find_us: In the cafe at Borders, look for the table with the stack of games and people sitting around trying to decide what to play. If this is your first meetup, please introduce yourself and ask for the organizer.
item.why: You'll love it because you know you love playing board/card games and you love meeting new, exciting people.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meeting
